name: places/ChIJWYfSr8dYwokRn2jF8FYWkvg
formattedAddress: 530 E 76th St # 6, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 530 E 76th St # 6, New York, NY 10021-3138, USA

originalText.text:
This building is beyond amazing!
*
The units facing the Park have unobstructed vistas FOREVER,- as no one can build blocking views. This is rare in Manhattan. In essence,- every unit situated on that side of the building has completely awesome views of the East River stretching peacefully on and on ...from each and every room.
With floor to ceiling windows that is a dream.
*
Amenities include :
-24/7 security & super attentive doormen
- A fierce lobby .. long and impressive.Polished
granite slabs on the floors paired with wooden
wall panels and post modern art make this
lobby boasting 30ft vaulted ceilings special.      Statuesque black columns,- a central
concierge desk and dedicated seating area  complete this ritzy post modern setting.
- The concierge desk caters to your every need
- The state of the art Health Club is located on the 38th floor and boasts beyond beautiful vistas rarely available in a fitness setting.
- The very spacious pool area is awesome.
- A residence lounge with professional catering facilities is perfect to just chill,- or host private or corporate parties,- small or large,- sure to
impress. Again,- incredible views galore.
- The lovely rooftop serves as a sun roof but
is also perfect as an outdoor running track
-  Yes,- this building has a conference room/   business center type space with wet bar!
It also has direct roof access for your clients
to enjoy and take in the 360 degree views.
- The building garage has access from within
- An in house dry cleaning service is super
convenient and effective
- In house maid service upon request is nice
- The laundry area on 6 is spotless &open late
- A bike room is available for all residents
- Extra Storage space is available upon request
- Last but not least;
The building super lives on premises and the
management office takes care of all you may
ever need promptly and immediately.
The entire staff is well trained, caring, and
often goes beyond their call of duty to make
residents feel at home and pampered.

-

originalText.text: Okay for a modern high-rise. Location is somewhat remote. Easterly views are protected but northern views are vulnerable if the Town School ever sells (fairly unlikely). Presence of Con Ed industrial complex is the other major negative of this location.

text.text: Okay for a modern high-rise. Location is somewhat remote. Easterly views are protected but northern views are vulnerable if the Town School ever sells (fairly unlikely). Presence of Con Ed industrial complex is the other major negative of this location.

originalText.text: I loved the view from the gym, i went to take some pictures of a job site. It was so beautiful. The staff were friendly, helpful and very nice.

text.text: I loved the view from the gym, i went to take some pictures of a job site. It was so beautiful. The staff were friendly, helpful and very nice.
